indicators.name: PIB Eurozona (QoQ)
indicators.description: Gross Domestic Product - Quarter-on-Quarter growth rate for Eurozone

indicators.name: PIB Eurozona (YoY)
indicators.description: Gross Domestic Product - Year-on-Year growth rate for Eurozone (calculated from quarterly data)

indicators.name: Inflación Eurozona (CPI YoY)
indicators.description: Harmonised Index of Consumer Prices (HICP) - Year-on-Year for Eurozone

indicators.name: Inflación Core Eurozona (Core CPI YoY)
indicators.description: HICP excluding Energy and Food - Year-on-Year for Eurozone

indicators.name: Tasa de Desempleo Eurozona
indicators.description: Unemployment Rate for Eurozone (Labour Force Survey, 15-74 years, total)

indicators.name: Confianza Empresarial Manufacturera Eurozona
indicators.description: Business Tendency Surveys (Manufacturing): Confidence Indicators for Euro Area (19 Countries) - FRED alternative to PMI

indicators.name: Confianza Empresarial Servicios Eurozona
indicators.description: Business Tendency Surveys: Composite Business Confidence: Economic Activity: Services for Euro Area (19 Countries) - FRED alternative to PMI

indicators.name: PMI Compuesto Eurozona
indicators.description: PMI Composite Index for Euro Area - From Trading Economics / S&P Global (requires paid plan for Euro Area access)

indicators.name: Tasa de Interés BCE (Main Refinancing Rate)
indicators.description: ECB Main Refinancing Operations Rate (business frequency, fechas de cambio)

indicators.name: Ventas Minoristas Eurozona (YoY)
indicators.description: Retail Trade Turnover Index (2021=100) for Euro Area - YoY calculated from index values. From ECB SDW (updated monthly)

indicators.name: Producción Industrial Eurozona (YoY)
indicators.description: Industrial Production Index (2021=100) for Euro Area - YoY calculated from index values. From ECB SDW (updated monthly)

indicators.name: Confianza del Consumidor Eurozona
indicators.description: Consumer Opinion Surveys: Composite Consumer Confidence for Euro Area (19 countries), seasonally adjusted - FRED alternative

indicators.name: Economic Sentiment Indicator Eurozona (ESI)
indicators.description: Economic Sentiment Indicator (ESI) for Eurozone - Eurostat alternative to ZEW, via Econdify API
